data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Prakash, Sanjeevi, Babu, Idrees, Gopi, Mohan, Kumar, Thipparamalai Thangappanpillai Ajith, Balasubramanian, Thangavel (2011): Discovery of the shrimp Pycnocaris chagoae Bruce, 1972 (Decapoda: Caridea: Gnathophyllidae) in the Lakshadweep Archipelago, India. Zootaxa 2998: 66-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.205342
